official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to accept
		  certain documents as proof of service in determining the eligibility of an
		  individual to receive amounts from the Filipino Veterans Equity Compensation
		  Fund, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

header.#text:
Proof of eligibility for
			 Filipino Veterans Equity Compensation Fund

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding at the end the following new subsections:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Section 1002 of the American Recovery and
			 Reinvestment Act of 2009
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009/s:1002

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall accept as proof of the service
				described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009/s:1002/ss:d
American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009/s:1002/ss:n

text.#text:
the name of the eligible person included on
				the Approved Revised Reconstructed Guerilla Roster (commonly known as the

documents included in the claims folder of
				the eligible person that prove such service, including an affidavit from the
				government of the Philippines certifying such service (AGO Form 23); or

any other documents that are issued or
				accepted by the government of the Philippines as proof of such service.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: may not reject a document under

solely because the document is issued by the government of the
				Philippines.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009/s:1002/ss:m/p:1

term.#tail:
includes the
				Commonwealth of the Philippines, the Commonwealth Army of the Philippines, and
				the Republic of the Philippines.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be treated
				as service described under such subsection for purposes of a person being
				eligible for benefits under this section.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009/s:1002/ss:d/p:1

text.#text:
Service as a civilian guerilla in the Philippines
				during the period described in
